评论概述: Pretty good cargo pants for the price - and cotton!
评论详情: Best things about these pants: 90% cotton and they fit as described in their Size chart. They also look good. Worst thing ( but not too bad): The elastic is a little tight. And, weirdly, despite having a zipper, they don't actually have a button; the top is a complete, elasticized circle. Other Facts: Rather nice looking. Comfortable: I wore them right out of the packaging and there was no breaking-in or itchy sizing chemicals. Still To Learn: Have no idea how durable these cargo pants will be. They are not heavy-duty, that is clear, but I did not buy them for camping or anything particularly rough, mainly for a casual style option other than jeans, for which they are perfect. Fact I Forgot To Mention: Despite have an elastic waist, there are also belt loopholes.

评论概述: Good for when you can't wear sweats
评论详情: I bought these for a long flight because belts are a pain at TSA and sitting for long periods with button-up pants can irritate by belly.  They worked great.  If you need pants that are comfortable but can't wear sweats or PJ pants, these are the best I've found.  My only two complaints are that the thigh pockets are button-closure instead of velcro, making them hard to close one-handed, and there's no slim pocket behind the thigh pockets like on every other cargo pants I've owned.

评论概述: Roomy lightweight grey-green cargo pants for men with elastic waist
评论详情: I'm a member of the generation who appreciates pants that aren't too tight and allows you ample room to move and bend. These lightweight pants fit the bill. I do like the elastic waist, which is comfortable and holds the pants up but also has belt loops should you want to wear a belt too.  The XL size fit me perfectly, and my waist size is 32 inches. I'm 6 ft tall, and the length was just about right, but I'm glad it wasn't any shorter. Haven't washed them yet so don't know if they will shrink at all. Also, looks like they will be easy enough to iron. One thing I was a little disappointed about was the color. I was expecting an army green color but these were more a grey-green.  But overall a decent pair of pants if you are looking for something to wear in warmer weather. They are a bit too thin to wear outside in the winter time in the northern US.
